threads.name: Threads

audience.description: Instagram overflow, less political, discovering news through social

best_for: Cross-posting from Twitter with added context
adaptation_notes: Take Twitter thread, expand each tweet with more context

example.twitter_original: 1978: Islamists burn Cinema Rex, kill 420, blame Shah. 2026: Same regime burns Rasht, kills protesters, blame 'rioters.' Same fire. Same lies.
example.threads_adapted:
In 1978, someone set fire to a movie theater in Iran called Cinema Rex. 420 people burned alive. The revolutionaries blamed the Shah's secret police.

Decades later, we learned the truth: it was actually Islamic militants who did it. The same people who took power months later.

Fast forward to January 2026. Protesters in the city of Rasht are trapped in a bazaar. Security forces set it on fire. 70+ bodies.

The government says protesters did it to themselves.

Same lie. 47 years apart.
